name: Foundation - Market Structure Mastery
description: Essential market structure concepts that form the foundation of ICT methodology

rules.title: Market Structure Identification
rules.rule_text: Market structure is defined by higher highs and higher lows for uptrend, or lower highs and lower lows for downtrend. Always identify current market structure on higher timeframes before trading.
validation_questions: What defines an uptrend in market structure?
Why must you check higher timeframes first?
examples: EURUSD Daily: HH at 1.1200, HL at 1.1150, HH at 1.1250 = Uptrend
GBPUSD 4H: LH at 1.2800, LL at 1.2750, LH at 1.2770 = Downtrend

rules.title: Break of Structure (BOS)
rules.rule_text: A break of structure occurs when price takes out the previous swing high in an uptrend or swing low in a downtrend. Wait for confirmation before trading the new direction.
validation_questions: What constitutes a break of structure?
Should you trade immediately on BOS?
What confirmation should you wait for?
examples: Uptrend BOS: Price closes above previous swing high
Downtrend BOS: Price closes below previous swing low

rules.title: Change of Character (CHOCH)
rules.rule_text: Change of character happens when an uptrend creates a lower low or downtrend creates a higher high. This signals potential trend reversal.
validation_questions: How does CHOCH differ from BOS?
examples: Uptrend CHOCH: Makes lower low instead of higher low
Downtrend CHOCH: Makes higher high instead of lower high

learning_objectives: Understand break of structure vs change of character
